name: Cross Border Trade and Finance Assistant

intents.name: Tariff Changes
intents.description: Provides analysis and updates on changes in tariffs and their impact on trade.
examples: What are the recent changes in tariffs for imports from China?
How will the new trade agreement affect tariffs?
Can you update me on the latest tariff changes in the EU?

miniAgents.name: GeoPolitical Sentinel Analysis
miniAgents.scope: Analyzes geopolitical factors affecting trade, including changes in tariffs and trade agreements.

intents.name: Interest Rate Negotiation
intents.description: Assists in negotiating interest rates for trade finance deals.
examples: Can you help me negotiate a better interest rate for my trade loan?
What are the current interest rates for trade finance?
How do I negotiate terms of credit with my bank?

miniAgents.name: Negotiator
miniAgents.scope: Handles negotiations related to trade finance, including interest rate discussions and terms of credit.

intents.name: Plan Shipment
intents.description: Assists in planning the logistics of a shipment, including selecting carriers and scheduling deliveries.
examples: Can you help me plan my shipment to Europe?
What are the best carriers for shipping electronics?
How do I schedule a delivery for my goods?

intents.name: Track Shipment
intents.description: Provides real-time tracking information for shipments and updates on delivery status.
examples: Where is my shipment currently located?
Can you track my package to the US?
What is the expected delivery date for my goods?

miniAgents.name: Logistic and Shipment Tracking
miniAgents.scope: Manages logistics planning and tracks shipments to ensure timely delivery and resolve any issues.

intents.name: Assess Compliance and Risk
intents.description: Analyzes trade transactions to ensure compliance and identify potential risks.
examples: Is my trade transaction compliant with international laws?
What are the risks associated with exporting to this country?
Can you assess the compliance of my trade deal?

miniAgents.name: Compliance and Risk Assessment
miniAgents.scope: Evaluates trade transactions for compliance with international regulations and assesses potential risks.

intents.name: Validate Export Documents
intents.description: Checks export documents for accuracy and compliance with trade regulations.
examples: Is my export invoice compliant with EU regulations?
Can you validate my packing list for export?
Are my export documents complete and accurate?

miniAgents.name: Export Documentation Validation
miniAgents.scope: Validates export documents to ensure compliance with international trade standards and regulations.

intents.name: Prepare Export Document
intents.description: Helps users prepare export documents such as invoices, packing lists, and certificates of origin.
examples: Can you help me prepare an invoice for export?
I need a packing list for my shipment.
How do I create a certificate of origin for my goods?

miniAgents.name: Export Documentation Preparation
miniAgents.scope: Assists in preparing necessary export documents, ensuring all required information is included and formatted correctly.

intents.name: Answer Trade Questions
intents.description: Provides answers to user queries about trade regulations, tariffs, market conditions, and other trade-related information.
examples: What are the current tariffs for exporting goods to the EU?
Can you provide information on trade regulations in China?
What are the market conditions for electronics in South America?

miniAgents.name: Query Response
miniAgents.scope: Handles queries related to answering trade-related questions, providing information on trade regulations, tariffs, and market conditions.

intentWorkflows.name: Workflow for Assess Compliance and Risk
